message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is worth more than $120 to me, but I believe in making it accessible to those who appreciate its unique features. For you, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a special rate. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your response!
